Title: Relates to making contractors and subcontractors that have been debarred under the Davis-Bacon Act (40 U.S.C. 3144) ineligible to bid for or be awarded public works contracts
Summary: Relates to making contractors, subcontractors, and substantially owned-affiliated entities that have been debarred under the Davis-Bacon Act (40 U.S.C. 3144) ineligible to bid for or be awarded public works contracts.
LawCode: Amd ยง220-b, Lab L; amd ยง103, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the general municipal law, in relation to requiring certain entities to disclose if they have been debarred from being awarded public contracts
